docs.lead_paragraph: Many researchers are ignoring a requirement that they register proposed clinical trials in a government database as a condition for publishing their results, a new study shows.

headline.main: Awareness: Clinical Trial Rule Is Widely Ignored
headline.print_headline: AWARENESS: Clinical Trials Often Not Registered

docs.snippet: Many researchers are ignoring a requirement that they register proposed clinical trials in a government database as a condition for publishing their results, a new study shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: Maintaining a healthy weight, getting regular exercise and limiting alcohol intake are among the steps that may reduce breast cancer risk.

headline.main: Regimens: Habits Help in Avoiding Breast Cancer, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Habits Help in Avoiding Breast Cancer, Study Finds

docs.snippet: Maintaining a healthy weight, getting regular exercise and limiting alcohol intake are among the steps that may reduce breast cancer risk.
